data.system_settings: iPhone 6S with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 2
data.actual_result: It uses always the English language. Note: For Desktop it is translated. Might also happen with Android.
data.expected_result: The strings should be translated for the respective languages.
data.short_description: Discord uses always English language for "Typing strings"
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your language to something other than English (for example German or French) - Ask someone to type something or use other account - Observe the typing strings (one user, two users, three users and several users)
